titleStmt.title: The afflicted mans vow with his meditations and prayers. Written by Iohn Mabb, of the Inner temple, Gent: and sometime student there.
titleStmt.author: Mabb, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Snodham and are to be sould by Iohn Helme at his shop in S. Dunstones Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Identified as STC 17156a on UMI microfilm reel 716.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
